title: How to make preserved lemons
description: Fragrant, strongly flavoured preserved lemons are well worth the wait. You can use a tiny bit each time stirred through mashed potato to serve with fish, mixed into rice for prawn curry, or in a tagine for authentic Moroccan flavour.Equipment and preparation: You will need 2 x 500g/1lb 2oz sealable Kilner-type jars.
ingredients: 250g/9oz flaky sea salt (depending on the size of the lemons)
